author: ETV Bharat
title: कृषि मंत्री किरोड़ी लाल मीणा का बड़ा बयान जल्द आएगा देशव्यापी कानून, नकली खाद और कीटनाशकों पर लगेगी रोक
text:
जयपुर : राजस्थान में नकली खाद, घटिया बीज और जहरीले कीटनाशकों के खिलाफ राज्य सरकार ने सख्त अभियान चलाया है. राज्य के कृषि मंत्री डॉ. किरोड़ी लाल मीणा ने बताया कि हाल ही में विभाग द्वारा प्रदेशभर में एक विशेष अभियान चलाया गया, जिसमें नकली उर्वरक, घटिया किस्म के बीज और अवैध कीटनाशकों को जब्त किया गया. उन्होंने यह भी बताया कि इस दौरान एक फर्जी बायोडीजल बनाने वाले प्लांट का भी भंडाफोड़ किया गया, जो किसानों और वाहन मालिकों की सेहत और संपत्ति के लिए गंभीर खतरा बन सकता था.
केंद्र से सख्त कानून की मांग : मंत्री किरोड़ी लाल मीणा ने कहा, कि उन्होंने हाल ही में केंद्रीय कृषि मंत्री शिवराज सिंह चौहान से मुलाकात की और उनसे आग्रह किया कि नकली खाद, बीज और कीटनाशकों के खिलाफ सख्त और प्रभावी कानून बनाए जाएं. इस तरह की गतिविधियां न केवल किसानों की मेहनत पर पानी फेरती हैं, बल्कि देश की खाद्य सुरक्षा के लिए भी खतरा हैं. उन्होंने बताया कि केंद्रीय मंत्री ने इस मांग को गंभीरता से लिया है और आश्वासन दिया है कि इस विषय पर कानून बनाने की प्रक्रिया शुरू कर दी गई है. जल्द ही संसद में नकली कृषि उत्पादों के विरुद्ध एक सशक्त कानून लाया जाएगा.
इसे भी पढ़ें: कृषि मंत्री किरोड़ी की अवैध स्टॉक के खिलाफ कार्रवाई, सूरतगढ़ के गोदाम से 30 हजार खाद बैग बरामद
किसानों की मेहनत के साथ धोखा : कृषि मंत्री डॉ. मीणा ने कहा कि नकली खाद और बीज से फसल खराब हो जाती है और किसानों को भारी नुकसान उठाना पड़ता है. कीटनाशकों में मिलावट से न केवल फसलें बर्बाद होती हैं, बल्कि मिट्टी की गुणवत्ता भी प्रभावित होती है. उन्होंने कहा कि ये सभी गलत गतिविधियां किसानों की मेहनत और भविष्य के साथ धोखा हैं. राज्य सरकार इस विषय पर पूरी तरह सख्त है और दोषियों पर कानूनी कार्रवाई की जा रही है.
माननीय केंद्रीय मंत्री श्री
— Office of Shivraj (@OfficeofSSC)[@ChouhanShivraj]जी से आज नई दिल्ली स्थित कृषि भवन में राजस्थान के माननीय कृषि एवं ग्रामीण विकास मंत्री श्री[@DrKirodilalBJP]जी ने सौजन्य भेंट की।
इस दौरान राजस्थान के माननीय मंत्री जी ने प्रदेश में नकली बीज, खाद एवं कीटनाशकों के विरुद्ध की गई कार्रवाई…[pic.twitter.com/1XgQsot8fr][July 21, 2025]
आज नई दिल्ली स्थित कृषि भवन में माननीय केंद्रीय कृषि मंत्री
— Dr. Kirodi Lal Meena (@DrKirodilalBJP)[@ChouhanShivraj]जी से भेंट कर राजस्थान में अमानक बीज, खाद और कीटनाशकों के विरुद्ध की गई कार्रवाई की विस्तृत रिपोर्ट प्रस्तुत की। उन्हें आश्वस्त किया कि प्रदेश में किसानों के साथ धोखा करने वालों को बख्शा नहीं जाएगा।
1/2[pic.twitter.com/3XYoX1IyzQ][July 21, 2025]
बायोडीजल प्लांट पर विशेष नजर : उन्होंने यह भी कहा कि नकली बायोडीजल का निर्माण और बिक्री पर्यावरण और वाहनों के लिए खतरनाक है. इस विषय पर हमने एक विशेष रिपोर्ट तैयार कर केंद्र को भेजी है, जिसमें बायोडीजल के नाम पर हो रही धोखाधड़ी के प्रमाण शामिल हैं.
इसे भी पढ़ें: बायोडीजल इकाइयों पर किरोड़ी लाल मीणा का छापा, करोड़ों की राजस्व हानि उजागर
कृषि मंत्री मीणा ने बताया कि राज्य सरकार अब नकली कृषि उत्पादों के खिलाफ एक स्थायी निगरानी तंत्र भी विकसित करने पर विचार कर रही है. जल्द ही राज्य में फास्ट-ट्रैक कोर्ट के माध्यम से ऐसे मामलों का त्वरित निपटारा भी संभव हो सकेगा. साथ ही उन्होंने यह दावा भी किया कि राजस्थान में नकली कृषि उत्पादों पर राज्य सरकार ने सख्त रुख अपनाया है. केंद्रीय मंत्री से बातचीत के बाद अब उम्मीद की जा रही है कि जल्द ही इस मुद्दे पर देशव्यापी कानून आएगा, जिससे किसानों को राहत और धोखेबाजों को कड़ी सजा मिल सकेगी.

author: Staff Writer - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Liberty Bowl: Memphis vs. Iowa State odds, picks and predictions
text: Liberty Bowl: Memphis vs. Iowa State odds, picks and predictions The Memphis Tigers (9-3) and Iowa State Cyclones (7-5) meet in the AutoZone Liberty Bowl at the Simmons Bank Liberty Bowl in Memphis, Tenn. on Friday. Kickoff is scheduled for 3:30 p.m. ET (ESPN/ESPN+). Below, we analyze [BetMGM Sportsbook's](https://gtly.to/MpDzEutbm) lines around the Memphis vs. Iowa Stateodds, and make our expert [college football picks and predictions](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/category/ncaaf-college-football-odds-lines-spreads-picks/). This is the 2nd-ever meeting between these teams, and both times have been in the Liberty Bowl game. Iowa State topped Memphis 21-20 as a 3.5-point underdog on Dec. 30, 2017, as the Under (67.5) easily cashed. The Tigers were a fun bunch during AAC play, posting 452.3 total yards and 39.7 points per game (PPG), while allowing 422.7 total yards and 29.0 PPG. Memphis covered the final 2 games, which was the 1st time it covered in consecutive outings all season. The Over went 10-2 for the Tigers, including 6-0 in the past 6 games overall. The Cyclones posted a 42-35 win at Kansas State to close the season, winning outright as a 10-point underdog as the Over (46) cashed. Iowa State ended up posting a solid 5-2 ATS mark in the final 7 games, while alternating the Over and Under in the final 6 contests. Iowa State lost RBs Cartevious Norton and Eli Sanders to the transfer portal, but leading rusher RB Abu Sama III is available. AS3 posted a team-best 610 yards and 6 TD, although he isn't a huge target out of the backfield. The key to this game will be if Iowa State can slow the prolific offense of Memphis. Iowa State allowed just 349.3 total yards and 21.7 PPG this season. Rankings: [US LBM Coaches Poll](https://www.usatoday.com/sports/ncaaf/polls/coaches-poll/) powered by USA TODAY Sports Stream select live college football games and full replays: [Get ESPN+](https://go.web.plus.espn.com/c/1205322/661047/9070?subId1=NCAAF&subId2=CollegeWire) Memphis vs. Iowa State odds Provided by [BetMGM Sportsbook](https://gtly.to/MpDzEutbm); access [USA TODAY Sports Scores and Sports Betting Odds hub](https://sportsdata.usatoday.com/football/ncaaf/scores) for a full list. Lines last updated Thursday at 6:14 p.m. ET. - Moneyline (ML): Memphis +310 (bet $100 to win $310) | Iowa State -400 (bet $400 to win $100) - Against the spread (ATS): Memphis +10.5 (-110) | Iowa State -10.5 (-110) - Over/Under (O/U): 57.5 (O: -110 | U: -110) Memphis vs. Iowa State picks and predictions Prediction Memphis 37, Iowa State 34 [Moneyline](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/08/betting-101-what-is-a-moneyline-bet-in-sports-betting/) Playing MEMPHIS (+310) on its home field for the chance to triple up is just too tempting to pass up. Yes, the Tigers lost to Iowa State (-400) in this game 6 years ago, but there are no coaches or players left over from that game, so it's merely an interesting fact these played each other, and nothing more. The Tigers are at home, and they went 4-2 SU in the Liberty, with losses only to SMU and Tulane, 2 teams which played in the AAC title game. Memphis is a very good team with a lot of weapons on offense. [Against the spread](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/12/sports-betting-101-betting-the-spread/) If you just can't bring yourself to go with the moneyline play, MEMPHIS +10.5 (-110) is a great play at home. The Tigers have QB Seth Henigan under center, and he threw for more than 3,500 yards this season with 28 TD in 12 games. He also ran for 247 yards and 4 TD, so the Iowa State -10.5 (-110) defensed will need to be on its toes. I just don't understand a 9-win team with an explosive offense, with no notable portal player or opt-outs, playing at home catching double digits in a bowl game. [Over/Under](https://sportsbookwire.usatoday.com/2019/07/11/betting-101-the-over-under/) OVER 57.5 (-110) is a slam-dunk play, and it's surprising this number wasn't well into the 60's. Memphis averaged 39.7 PPG this season, while conceding 29.0 PPG. The Tigers cashed the Over in the final 6 games, and 9 of the past 10 outings. This is an explosive offense which lit up the scoreboard for 44 or more points in 5 of the final 6 games, really finding itself down the stretch. It also allowed 38 or more points in 4 of the final 5, so expect an entertaining contest resembling a video game. Play our free daily [Pick’em Challenge](https://dailyticket.usatoday.com/) and win! [Play now](https://dailyticket.usatoday.com/)! author: RT en Español
title: China insta a Asia-Pacífico a estar "muy alerta" por el "despliegue militar avanzado" de EE.UU. - RT
text:
China reacciona a los planes de expansión militar de EE.UU. Publicado: 28 dic 2023 20:03 GMT Se informa que el Pentágono está planeando reabrir la Base de la Fuerza Aérea de Tinián Norte, Islas Marianas del Norte, desde donde EE.UU. lanzó los ataques nucleares contra Japón.
Los Juegos Deportivos Militares Anuales de 2023 en Baise, provincia de Guangxi (China), 29 de noviembre de 2023. CFOTO/Sipa USA / Legion-Media El vocero del Ministerio de Defensa chino, Wu Qian, ha instado este jueves a los países de Asia-Pacífico a no bajar la guardia frente a la instalación continua de fuerzas militares estadounidenses en la región.
" EE.UU. ha fortalecido su despliegue militar avanzado en la región de Asia-Pacífico y ha aumentado las tensiones regionales . Los países de la región deben permanecer muy alerta", ha advertido el portavoz.
De este modo, el representante del Ministerio de Defensa chino ha comentado los informes que señalan que el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. está planeando reabrir la Base de la Fuerza Aérea de Tinián Norte, parte de la Mancomunidad de las islas Marianas del Norte, territorio no incorporado de EE.UU., ubicado a unos 6.000 kilómetros al oeste de Hawái.
EE.UU. reabrirá el aeródromo desde donde lanzó los ataques nucleares a Japón El aeródromo Tinián Norte , conocido por ser el punto de partida para los bombardeos atómicos de Japón durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, clausurado en 1947, actualmente está cubierto de maleza, pero una vez despejada "esa jungla" para el próximo verano, el Pentágono contará con una instalación muy amplia , según había indicado este mes el general Kenneth Wilsbach, comandante de las Fuerzas Aéreas del Pacífico.
Ante las perspectivas de que esta base aérea estadounidense se convierta en un nuevo punto de apoyo estratégico para el Ejército de EE.UU. en la región, el vocero del Ministerio de Defensa chino ha afirmado que "el Ejército chino presta mucha atención a los acontecimientos relevantes, defiende resueltamente la soberanía territorial nacional y los derechos e intereses marítimos, así como mantiene resueltamente la paz y la estabilidad en la región de Asia-Pacífico".
Armas nucleares Asia Aviación China Defensa Ejército Estados Unidos Historia Historia de la Guerra internacional

author: Jenny Melzer
title: Bad Animation Has Already Ruined This Spring 2025 Anime's Chances
text:
The Beginning After the End's anime adaptation is now five episodes in, and while it's certainly had its ups and downs, I still keep tuning in each week to find out what could possibly happen next. Episode 5, "The King's Test" had some interesting story developments, but the one thing that continues to hold this anime back hangs over it like a dark cloud, and that's the animation quality.
For an anime with so much action-potential, quality animation is essential to drive things home. The Beginning After the End's story definitely has high points that resonate with a lot of viewers, but when it comes to anime, story alone can't be enough to sustain a series, especially when it's new and trying to make a mark in an incredibly competitive medium. I do not deny that Arthur Leywin's story is an interesting one, interesting enough that I even started reading the webcomic after Episode 1 because I wanted to know more, but knowing more doesn't improve the many issues the anime has.
Week after week, the story progresses, and before long there will likely be even more high-action scenes in need of animation. The way things are now, the anime will never be able to do those scenes the justice they deserve. Maybe that makes me a cynic, but that doesn't mean I'm wrong. The Beginning After the End has so much potential, but maybe this particular anime adaptation isn't the one that will live up to it. It wouldn't be the first time an anime has seen multiple adaptations, which I know sounds silly when considering we haven't even finished the first cour of Season 1 yet. For those willing to see this through to the end, I am pretty sure it will be the story holding them in place, and not the animation.
Related
My Patience is Beginning to End For The Beginning After the End
Arthur Leywin's inner voice guides him into a dangerous rescue mission that should be far more than a four-year-old can handle alone.
The Kingdom of Elves Has No Interest In Welcoming Arthur
Arthur Saving Princess Tessia Doesn't Matter Much to the People of Elonoir
Passing through the portal in the forest at the end of The Beginning After the End Episode 4, fans were left wondering by the Episode 5 preview whether Tessia had somehow betrayed Arthur, even after calling him her friend. Immediately seized by guards, Tessia is slow to jump to his defense at first, which pushes the voice of his previous life to reflect on her manipulating him. Arthur is all too driven by the cynical voice of King Grey, who has guided this new life to his own design from the moment he came into the world in a new body for a second chance at life.
Given the things King Grey endured during his reign, from betrayal to assassination, it's no wonder he's got trust issues, but Tessia has been a solid representation of innocent, if not a little spoiled, since the moment they met. Just when he's convinced she betrayed him, she jumps to his defense, explaining that he saved her. The elven guards are so anti-human, they're convinced that this four-year-old boy manipulated and brainwashed their princess, which falls back on one of my issues from last week's episode.
Related
'I Felt It Necessary for Me to Speak Up': The Beginning After the End Creator Updates Fans on Controversial Anime Series
The Beginning After the End creator TurtleMe opens up following backlash to the highly anticipated and widely criticized Spring 2025 anime adaptation.
Arthur being four still doesn't sit well with me. I know it's fantasy, but it's still hard to suspend my personal disbelief that a kid that young could do the things he can. Even with the power of a dragon and his skilled past-life guiding the way, he's just too overpowered for me sometimes.
When Tessia's grandpa, Virion Eralith, arrives via portal in time to stop the guards from making a horrendous mistake, he rationalizes they can hardly be blamed. The elf princess was missing, and she returned with a human in tow. This is the first time Arthur has heard the news that Tessia is more than just an elf girl. She's Princess of Elenoir, which means things are about to get even more complicated.
Elenoir Welcomes Arthur Leywin, But Not Without Prejudice & Hesitation
Princess Tessia Insists They Show Arthur Their Gratitude & Hospitality
One of the nice things about this episode is seeing the future generation, which will one day reshape relations between warring nations, making more sense than their parents and the old grudges. Even after Tessia's mother and father arrive, the cliched elven prejudice against Arthur evident on the king's face, Tessia thinks of Art as her friend. The fact that he's human doesn't really bother her much at all, which suggests their bond has the potential to shape the future and rid their world of the racial tensions that hold their people apart.
Even as they are reluctant to agree, Tessia insists they welcome Arthur into their home. Once inside the palace, she gives a speech to the servants, asking them to treat him with respect and pointing out that he is not a bad human. As the two later gather around the table with her parents and grandfather, Arthur explains the circumstances behind Tessia's rescue, but the king doesn't believe he could possibly be capable of taking out bandits, even if he is a mage. As Tessia confirms she was kidnapped and the bandits wanted to sell her off, the king admits to believing Arthur.
Related
Spring 2025's Overlooked Action Fantasy Anime Becomes Sudden Major Streaming Hit
A streaming service not usually known for popular new anime is seeing an overlooked new fantasy anime in the same viewership category as Reacher.
Arthur uses this opportunity to ask the king for help. As he was also attacked by bandits, and separated from his family, he would like help returning to and reuniting with them. The king is put off by this request, but when he calls Arthur a human savage, Arthur reasons that their claim to superiority had him expecting they would not display such savage behavior themselves. That is enough to convince the king, and though the portal doesn't open but once every seven years for the representatives of all three races to meet, he will consent to having some of his men escort Arthur back to Sapin.
Arthur Has Been Allowing Grey's Experiences To Influence His Outlook
Realizing this Is a Big Step For His Character
Episode 4 had Arthur doubling over in pain, and though the agony he felt seemed to dissipate after he ate the mushrooms he and Tessia foraged, the pain wasn't hunger. It seems to be coming on him more frequently, growing more agonizing with each attack on his body. As he's standing in the shower clutching his chest, he quietly seeks Sylvia's guidance, asking her what it means and what he can do. There is no answer, of course, but that's only a temporary issue.
Arthur heads outside after his shower, recognizing that the cool breeze soothes the pain, but he can't take much more of it. He needs to understand why it's happening. When he glances up at the balcony overhead, he sees Tessia with her parents and begins thinking of his own mother and father, wondering if they are okay. He openly admits he misses them, but he can't help but wonder if they will be as happy to be reunited with him as Tessia's parents are to see her again.
Related
Crunchyroll Pushes Play on Isekai Smash-Hit Overlord Movie
The latest entry in the Overlord anime adaptation is finally heading to streaming on Crunchyroll after its 2024 theatrical debut.
As he and Tessia run into each other in the hallway, he teases her about having spoiled princess time with her family. She actually came to apologize to him for how rude her father and the others were to him. He admits that it's probably just because they were so happy she came back to them, and that's why she should take advantage of them spoiling her. He can't help wondering if his parents will even be happy to see him again, believing it to have been his fault they were attacked in the first place. This isn't Arthur's fear, so much as Grey's influence, but Tessia tries to put the thoughts out of his mind when she grabs him by the face and scolds him for thinking that way.
As fireflies light up around them, Arthur thinks of his mother and father again, as Tessia sits in the grass and explains that the flowers around her are called Firefly pots. Arthur can't help but think about the face Tessia wore when they first returned to her home and found themselves surrounded by soldiers. He was sure she'd betrayed him, but then he realizes he is allowing too much of Arthur's experience to be shaped by Grey's past, as if he's constantly warring with a life that isn't even his. This is the first time he's had a realization like this, and it's a great turning point for his character, who softens immensely and allows himself to enjoy Tessia's enthusiasm for the flowers and the fireflies around them.
Arthur's Been In Agony Since Leaving Sylvia
Can Tessia's Grandpa Help Make Sense of What's Wrong With him
While the pair are enjoying the fireflies, Virion makes a surprise attack in an effort to test Arthur's true abilities. After learning that he single-handedly took out those bandits with sorcery, the former king of Elenoir wants to see just how powerful this human boy really is. At first, Arthur is appalled that he would attack his own granddaughter, but when he admits his trick wouldn't have hurt anyone, Arthur is still worried. Tessia confronts him, asking why he came to pick on him, but Virion explains he hasn't taken this kind of interest in someone in a very long time.
Virion summons a wooden sword and tosses it to Arthur, then begins putting him through his paces. This whole scene had the potential to be truly epic, but instead, its still shot after still shot with comic panel-like breaks to express the character's reactions and motion lines blurring across the top and bottom. It's disappointing, to say the least.
Once the battle ends, Virion explains to Arthur that he wants him to become his apprentice. Arthur is hesitant, because his parents don't know that he's still alive, but Virion ensures him that they will inform his family that he is alive and well. Within a second of this, the pain Arthur has been experience nearly overwhelms him, which prompts Virion to explain that he has inherited a Beast Will, and becoming his apprentice is the only way to save his life.
Related
These 10/10 Isekai Anime Prove the Genre Is Worth It
Isekai anime like Inuyasha and Mushoku Tensei are 10/10 series that make the most of characters building new lives in another world.
Cliffhanger ending, not unexpected, but all-in-all, the story in this episode was decently paced, and as has happened nearly every time, it's keeping me coming back week after week to find out where it goes next. That does not do much for the animation quality, and as I mentioned above, no matter how intriguing the story is at this point, poorly animated action scenes are not going to keep anime fans coming back for more for very long.
It's a massive disapppointment because, while countries like China and Korea are finding success in Japanese anime, North America's not having the same experience at all. A story like The Beginning After the End is perfect for anime, but the disservice it's been done is going to leave a bad taste in the mouths of a lot of fans. As I mentioned above, I can only hope that one day, a better animation studio with a bigger budget and clear vision comes back to this story and gives it the treatment it deserves.
Your comment has not been saved
The Beginning After the End
- Release Date
- April 2, 2025
- Network
- AT-X
Cast
-
Natsumi FujiwaraArthur Leywin (voice)
-
Makoto FurukawaGrey (voice)
- Creator(s)
- TurtleMe
- Intriguing story developments
- Bad animation quality
- High fantasy tropes are still cliche

title: Mehr Geld für die Inklusion in den Ortenauer Kitas - Offenburg - Badische Zeitung
text:
Eingliederungshilfe
Mehr Geld für die Inklusion in den Ortenauer Kitas
In der Ortenau steigt die Zahl der Kinder mit Anspruch auf Eingliederungshilfe. Doch der Fachkräftemangel verzögert die Unterstützung. Ein neues Konzept soll nun helfen.
Wir benötigen Ihre Zustimmung um BotTalk anzuzeigen
Unter Umständen sammelt BotTalk personenbezogene Daten für eigene Zwecke und verarbeitet diese in einem Land mit nach EU-Standards nicht ausreichenden Datenschutzniveau.
Durch Klick auf "Akzeptieren" geben Sie Ihre Einwilligung für die Datenübermittlung, die Sie jederzeit über Cookie-Einstellungen widerrufen können.

author: Rebecca Dore
title: Elaine Crowley Sparkles At Cllr Teresa Costello's Wedding
text:
Elaine Crowley was a picture of pure happiness as her friend Dublin local councillor Teresa Costello said 'I do'.
The broadcaster was right by the Tallaght councilwoman's side as she tied the knot in serious style.
Today's top videos
There were smiles all around as Teresa, who is a breast cancer survivor, got ready for her trip down the aisle on the morning of her wedding with her bride tribe and the matching purple dressing gowns were out.
Elaine Crowley with Teresa Costello on her wedding day. Pic: Supplied Elaine dazzled in a mint green dress which was awash with twinkling sequins.
She wore her hair in gentle waves with dark smokey eyeshadow which complemented her eyes beautifully and she also wore light pink lippy.
Pic: Supplied The bride opted for a glamorous strapless gown with a tulle skirt that had a dainty bow waistband for her big day and she accessorised with a glittering necklace and drop earrings.
Wearing her hair up with curled bangs, the bride chose a dewy makeup look with statement smokey eyes and pink lipstick.
Pic: Supplied The Dublin mum was diagnosed with stage three breast cancer at the age of 36 .
Her world was rocked by the prognosis and she then underwent chemotherapy and a mastectomy followed by immediate reconstruction and radiotherapy.
Pic: Supplied Teresa is a Breast Cancer Ireland ambassador who has been helping women all around Ireland navigate their journey with the disease through her online support group Breast Friends .

persons.name: elaine crowley sparkles at cllr teresa costello

author: AFP
title: Inondations au Brésil: des milliards promis pour reconstruire, menace de nouvelles pluies - 10/05/2024 à 01:45
text:
Des soldats de l'armée de l'air brésilienne préparent les dons pour les sinistrés des inondations, à Brasilia, au Brésil, le 10 mai 2024 ( AFP / EVARISTO SA )
Le gouvernement brésilien a promis jeudi de débloquer quelque neuf milliards d'euros pour la reconstruction de l'Etat du Rio Grande do Sul, région dévastée par des inondations meurtrières sans précédent et sous la menace de nouvelles pluies.
Au moins 107 personnes sont mortes, 754 ont été blessées et 134 sont portées disparues à la suite des pluies diluviennes qui se sont abattues dans cette région du sud toute la semaine dernière, selon le bilan de la Défense civile publié jeudi soir.
Environ 1,7 million de personnes ont été affectées et plus de 327.000 évacuées après ces intempéries, une catastrophe naturelle que les experts et le gouvernement associent au changement climatique.
Alors que les équipes de secours luttent toujours pour sauver habitants et animaux piégés par les eaux dans un décor de désolation, le chef de l'Etat Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva a présidé une réunion à Brasilia pour évoquer les réponses à la tragédie.
Le gouvernement fédéral a décidé d'injecter des "ressources de l'ordre de 50 milliards de réais (environ 9 milliards d'euros) dans le Rio Grande do Sul", a annoncé le ministre des Finances Fernando Haddad.
Les mesures arrêtées accordent la priorité à l'octroi de prêts pour aider travailleurs, entreprises et municipalités touchés.
Des pompiers en bateau dans la ville inondée de Porto Alegre, dans l'Etat du Rio Grande do Sul, le 9 mai 2024 au Brésil ( AFP / Anselmo CUNHA )
La Banque interaméricaine de développement (BID) allouera, elle, environ un milliard d'euros de ressources "pour la protection de l'emploi, le soutien aux entreprises et les projets de reconstruction des infrastructures", a annoncé le président brésilien de l'institution, Ilan Goldfajn.
- "Caramelo sauvé !" - Ces inondations ont touché la capitale de l'Etat, Porto Alegre et ses 1,4 million d'habitants, mais aussi plus de 400 localités de la région. Quelque 60.000 maisons ont été endommagées ou détruites.
Les équipes de secours ont repris jeudi la recherche de personnes piégées dans leur maison ou réticentes à la quitter par crainte de pillages.
Vue aérienne des inondations à Eldorado do Sul, dans l'Etat du Rio Grande do Sul, le 9mai 2024 au Brésil ( AFP / Carlos FABAL )
Les secouristes se mobilisent aussi pour sauver des animaux, comme ce cheval que les médias locaux ont montré esseulé sur le toit d'une maison submergée, à Canoas, en banlieue de Porto Alegre, et secouru à l'aide de canots gonflables.
Baptisé Caramelo par les habitants, son sauvetage est devenu viral sur les réseaux sociaux, et pas seulement au Brésil. "Caramelo a été sauvé!", a exulté sur X la Première dame Rosangela da Silva, dite "Janja".
- Musk contribue - Autre tâche gigantesque pour les autorités locales, le renforcement de la logistique afin d'accélérer la distribution de biens de première nécessité aux sinistrés, alors que de nouvelles pluies sont annoncées à partir de vendredi.
"L'accent est toujours mis sur les sauvetages (...) mais nous travaillons très intensément sur l'acheminement de l'aide humanitaire", a dit Sabrina Ribas, porte-parole de la Défense civile.
Un habitant en kayak dans la ville inondée de Porto Alegre, dans l'Etat du Rio Grande do Sul, le 9 mai 2024 au Brésil ( AFP / Anselmo CUNHA )
Ces efforts devraient être entravés "dans une certaine mesure" dans les jours à venir compte tenu des prévisions de "fortes pluies" à partir de vendredi, a-t-elle prévenu.
Autre obstacle aux efforts: les infox. Le gouvernement a demandé à la police fédérale d'ouvrir une enquête sur des "crimes possibles" liés à la diffusion de "fake news".
Dans un complexe sportif du centre de la capitale régionale, un refuge accueille quelque 450 sinistrés -- ainsi qu'une quarantaine de chiens et un petit cochon. Les sinistrés ont passé la nuit sur des matelas posés à même le sol d'un gymnase.
Des bénévoles trient sur place couettes, vêtements chauds ou encore couches pour bébés. "Moi, je n'ai rien perdu, mais je ne me sentais pas bien en restant à la maison. Aider, c'est quelque chose d'humain", confie Tauane Bassoler, 26 ans, en pliant des vêtements.
L'eau est également montée dans les prisons de l'Etat, qui ont sollicité une aide fédérale après avoir manqué d'eau potable, selon l'ONG Criminal Justice Network. Dans la prison de Charqueadas, un groupe de détenus a dû être transféré aux étages supérieurs.
Un militaire observe depuis un hélicoptère la ville inondée de Porto Alegre, dans l'État du Rio Grande do Sul, au Brésil, le 8 mai 2024 ( AFP / Carlos FABAL )
Des gestes de solidarité sont également venus de l'étranger. Le pape François a envoyé 100.000 euros pour aider à soigner les personnes évacuées, selon le site Vatican News.
Elon Musk a, lui, annoncé sur son réseau X que son entreprise Starlink allait faire don de mille terminaux internet aux équipes de secours. "J'espère le meilleur pour le peuple brésilien", a ajouté le milliardaire, récemment empêtré dans un bras de fer avec la justice brésilienne.

author: Ute Barthel; Rbb
title: Vorwürfe von Mobbing, Verleumdung, Schwulenfeindlichkeit: Was geschah an der Carl-Bolle-Grundschule? | rbb24
text:
Vorwürfe eines Lehrers - Mobbing, Verleumdung, Schwulenfeindlichkeit: Was geschah an der Carl-Bolle-Grundschule?
An der Carl-Bolle-Schule in Berlin-Mitte soll ein Lehrer über Monate gemobbt und von Schülern beleidigt worden sein. Inzwischen hat der Fall die Politik erreicht - die Bildungssenatorin räumt Versäumnisse ein. Eine Chronologie von Ute Barthel
Oziel Inacio-Stech arbeitet seit 2016 an der Berliner Carl-Bolle-Grundschule als pädagogische Unterrichtshilfe. Er betreut dort Kinder mit Förderbedarf im Unterricht und in kleineren Lerngruppen. Er ist homosexuell und der Beauftragte für Diversity an der Schule.
Der Lehrer wird nach eigenen Angaben von Schülern monatelang beschimpft, beleidigt und gemobbt. Das wird Anfang 2025 durch Medienberichte öffentlich bekannt. Er beklagt außerdem Mobbing und falsche Vorwürfe durch eine Kollegin.
Der Redaktion rbb24 Recherche liegen verschiedene Dokumente zu seinem Fall vor: Gesprächsprotokolle, Anzeigen wegen Gewalttätigkeiten, Schreiben seines Anwalts und von ihm an die Schulleitung, die zuständige Schulaufsicht, die Senatsschulverwaltung, Auszüge aus den polizeilichen Ermittlungsakten. Mithilfe dieser Quellen hat der rbb folgende Chronologie der Ereignisse erstellt.
Mai 2023
Oziel Inacio-Stech wird von einem Schüler einer 5. Klasse während des Unterrichts massiv beleidigt. Der Schüler macht Witze über Homosexuelle und bedroht ihn körperlich. Das geht aus einem "Gewaltprotokoll” der Lehrerin hervor, in deren Deutschunterricht er als Unterrichtshilfe eingesetzt war.
Inacio-Stech schreibt der Schulleitung und bittet um einen Gesprächstermin und um Soforthilfe und Prävention. Er kontaktiert außerdem nach eigenen Angaben die externe Beratungsstelle "Queerformat" des Landes Berlin, die seit 2019 für die Umsetzung und Qualitätssicherung der Bildungsarbeit im Bereich sexueller und geschlechtlicher Vielfalt an Schulen und Bildungseinrichtungen des Landes tätig ist. Inacio-Stech schlägt der Schulleitung einen Workshop über Diversität in der Klasse vor, mit Beratern von "Queerformat". Dieser Vorschlag soll, wie er in einer persönlichen Stellungnahme mitteilt, von der Schulleitung abgelehnt worden sein.
Mai und Juni 2024
Am 30. Mai 2024 beobachtet eine Lehrerin, wie Inacio-Stech zwei Kindern einen Film über Stolpersteine auf dem Handy zeigt. Dabei sollen sie auf Sitzsäcken gesessen haben, Inacio-Stech in der Mitte. Nach Empfinden der Lehrerin sollen sie "sehr nahe" beieinander gesessen haben; in einem anschließenden Gespräch der Lehrerin mit den Kindern hätten diese ausgedrückt, dass sie sich in dieser Situation unwohl gefühlt hätten. Die Lehrerin wendet sich an die Schulleitung.
Am 4. Juni 2024 findet daraufhin ein Gespräch zwischen der Schulleiterin, dem Konrektor und Inacio-Stech statt. Schulleiterin und Konrektor legen dem Lehrer dar, dass "er zu seinem Schutz eine gewisse Distanz zu den Schülerinnen und Schülern wahren müsste, damit keine Gerüchte entstehen könnten. Aus der Erfahrung heraus gibt es immer noch Unterschiede, auch wenn es nicht gerechtfertigt ist, im Umgang mit Kindern, ob ein Mann oder eine Frau diese betreuen würden." So steht es in dem Gesprächsprotokoll der Schulleitung. Inacio-Stech weist die Äußerung, er würde den Kindern zu nahe kommen, zurück. Er empfindet das als "Vorwurf" oder "Anschuldigung" und führt es auf seine Homosexualität zurück. Daraufhin zeigt er die Lehrerin wegen übler Nachrede bei der Polizei an.
Am 13. Juni 2024 kommt es zu einem weiteren Gespräch mit der Schulleitung und der Kollegin, die die "Anschuldigungen" erhoben hatte. Auch ein Vertreter des Personalrats nimmt daran teil. Laut Gesprächsprotokoll rät dieser dem Lehrer, sein pädagogisches Konzept zu ändern, denn "die Carl-Bolle-Schule würde von überdurchschnittlich vielen Kindern aus traditionellen Elternhäusern besucht werden, das könne die Akzeptanz von Diversität erschweren". Außerdem weist er auf die Möglichkeit hin, sich an eine andere Schule versetzen zu lassen. Der Konflikt zwischen Inacio-Stech und der Kollegin wird nicht beigelegt.
September 2024
Am 3. September 2024 reicht der Anwalt von Inacio-Stech Beschwerde wegen Verstoßes gegen das Allgemeine Gleichbehandlungsgesetz (AGG) bei der Senatsverwaltung für Bildung ein. Er bezieht sich auf die Aussagen der Kollegin und den Umgang der Schulleitung damit. Der Anwalt sieht in der Tatsache, dass Oziel Inacio-Stech die betreffenden Kinder nicht mehr unterrichten dürfe, eine Diskriminierung.
Am 11. September 2024 zeigt der Konrektor Oziel Inacio-Stech wegen Verletzung der Fürsorge– und Erziehungspflicht an. Er bezieht sich – nach seiner Aussage – auf Befragungen von Schülerinnen und Schülern.
Die Kinder widerrufen im Laufe der polizeilichen Ermittlungen ihre Aussagen. Nach den dem rbb vorliegenden Unterlagen sollen sie gesagt haben, die Vorwürfe seien ihnen von einer Lehrerin eingeredet worden. Das Verfahren wird im November 2024 eingestellt.
Am 18. September 2024 beschwert sich Inacio-Stech beim Konrektor, weil dieser angeordnet hatte, dass Inacio-Stech die Kinder nur noch auf dem Flur unterrichten dürfe.
Am 25. September 2024 reicht sein Anwalt Beschwerde wegen Diskriminierung bei der Schulaufsicht des Bezirks Mitte ein. Am 1. Oktober 2024 wird die Anordnung des Konrektors aufgehoben.
Dezember 2024
Mit Datum vom 4. Dezember 2024 schreibt der Anwalt an Bildungssenatorin Katharina Günther-Wünsch (CDU). Das Schreiben ist an sie "persönlich" gerichtet, enthält im Betreff jedoch auch die Formulierung "Beschwerde nach §13 AGG" (Allgemeines Gleichbehandlungsgesetz). In dem Schreiben wirft der Anwalt von Inacio-Stech einem Mitarbeiter der Schulaufsicht Berlin-Mitte Befangenheit vor. Dieser Mitarbeiter ist für die Prüfung der Beschwerde wegen Verstoßes gegen das Gleichbehandlungsgesetz zuständig. Im Oktober 2024 habe dieser Mitarbeiter, schreibt der Anwalt, in einer Email mitgeteilt, dass er weder Mobbing noch Diskriminierung in dem Vorgehen der Schulleitung der Carl-Bolle-Schule sehe.
Offenbar hat die Senatorin dieses an sie persönlich gerichtete Schreiben nicht gelesen. Stattdessen wird es – wie bei Beschwerden wohl üblich - an die Schulaufsicht des Bezirks Mitte als zuständige Stelle für Beschwerden gegen das AGG weitergeleitet. So landet die Beschwerde wegen des Verdachts der Befangenheit auf dem Schreibtisch des Mitarbeiters, dem der Anwalt Befangenheit vorwirft.
Am 16. Dezember 2024 stellt Inacio-Stech einen Umsetzungsantrag an die deutsch-portugiesische Europa-Schule in Berlin-Mitte. Er begründet den Antrag mit den Vorwürfen, denen er sich an der Carl-Bolle-Schule ausgesetzt sieht. Da er aus Brasilien stamme, würde er durch die Zweisprachigkeit gute Voraussetzungen für diese Schule mitbringen, begründet er seinen Antrag. Dieser Antrag wird von demselben Mitarbeiter der Schulaufsicht im Bezirk Mitte abgelehnt, der auch die AGG-Beschwerde prüft. In seiner Antwort-Mail schreibt er, dass an der Europaschule in Mitte derzeit kein Bedarf für eine Pädagogische Unterrichtshilfe bestehe.
Januar 2025
Am 14. Januar 2025 lehnt der Mitarbeiter der Schulaufsicht Mitte die Beschwerde wegen Verstoß gegen das Allgemeine Gleichstellungsgesetz ab. Auch den Vorwurf der Befangenheit weist er zurück.
Februar 2025
Am 3. Februar 2025 erscheint ein erster Artikel in der "Märkischen Oderzeitung" über den Fall.
Am 4. Februar 2025 schreibt Inacio-Stech an den Mitarbeiter der Schulaufsicht und drückt sein Unverständnis über die Ablehnung seiner Beschwerde aus. Außerdem bittet er ihn, eine Rehabilitation seiner Person durch die Schulleitung zu veranlassen. Er weist dabei auch auf die Einstellung des Ermittlungsverfahrens gegen ihn hin.
Am 11. Februar 2025 antwortet der Mitarbeiter, dass die Schulaufsicht die Vorwürfe gegen Inacio-Stech nach so langer Zeit nicht zweifelsfrei bewerten könne. Er teilt in diesem Zusammenhang auch mit, dass es sich bei den Kindern, auf die die Vorwürfe zurückgehen sollen, um Kinder mit dem Förderschwerpunkt "Geistige Entwicklung" handele. Außerdem belehrt er ihn, dass er von ihm im Umgang mit den Kindern einen "professionellen Umgang unter Wahrung einer angemessenen körperlichen und emotionalen Distanz" erwarte. Auf den Wunsch nach Rehabilitation geht er nicht ein.
Sendung: rbb24 Inforadio, 26.06.2025, 13:40 Uhr

author: Harris
title: GEP ECOTECH Partners with Publicly Listed Company in China on Fiber-Reinforced Plastics Recycling Project
text: GEP ECOTECH Partners with Publicly Listed Company in China on Fiber-Reinforced Plastics Recycling Project GEP ECOTECH provided a shredding system to a listed company for processing waste Fiber-Reinforced Plastics(FRP) in its cement kiln co-processing project. [EINPresswire.com](https://www.einpresswire.com/)/ -- GEP ECOTECH has teamed up with a leading publicly listed company to explore innovative ways of utilizing waste fiber-reinforced plastics (FRP) as an alternative fuel in cement kilns. As part of this collaboration, GEP ECOTECH supplied a dual-stage shredding system, designed to reduce FRP waste into 5cm fragments suitable for rotary kiln processing. “This project marks our first step into the disposal of fiber-reinforced plastic waste,” said Project Leader Lu. “After evaluating multiple suppliers, both domestic and international, we selected GEP ECOTECH for their proven expertise, reliable equipment, comprehensive after-sales service, and competitive pricing.” GEP ECOTECH representatives emphasized the importance of close cooperation throughout the project. “We conducted in-depth discussions with the client to understand their needs and challenges,” a GEP ECOTECH spokesperson explained. “Our engineering team delivered a [customized shredding solution](https://www.aishred.com/application/)to efficiently handle FRP waste and ensure seamless integration into the cement production process.” Fiber-reinforced plastics are widely used materials known for their strength and durability. However, their disposal poses significant challenges due to their complex composition. This publicly listed company is currently processing FRP waste from gratings and pipelines, but another pressing challenge lies in the disposal of decommissioned wind turbine blades—a rapidly growing issue in the renewable energy sector. GEP ECOTECH has been actively developing recycling solutions for wind turbine blades, leveraging its expertise in shredding technology to tackle the size and structural complexity of these components. By reducing the blades into manageable pieces, the material can be efficiently repurposed, including as alternative fuels for cement kilns. Through continuous innovation, GEP ECOTECH is committed to supporting sustainable resource management and addressing the evolving needs of industries dealing with FRP waste. To efficiently process fiber-reinforced plastics, GEP ECOTECH offers a diverse range of equipment, including four-shaft, dual-shaft, and [single-shaft shredders](https://www.aishred.com/product/single-shaft-shredder.html), as well as hammer mills, tailored to meet various operational requirements. [Four-shaft shredders](https://www.aishred.com/product/four-shaft-shredder.html): Known for their precise output control, these machines are ideal for complex FRP waste, ensuring uniform particle sizes suitable for further processing. Dual-shaft shredders: Designed for handling bulky materials like wind turbine blades, they operate at low speeds with high torque to ensure reliable performance under heavy loads. Single-shaft shredders: Best suited for finer shredding tasks, such as processing FRP pipes and smaller components, with adjustable screens for customized output sizes. Hammer mills: Efficient for pulverizing FRP waste into finer particles, enhancing its usability as alternative fuel or raw material in cement kilns. With this range of equipment, GEP ECOTECH provides flexible, high-performance solutions to meet the specific needs of industries dealing with FRP waste, promoting sustainability through optimized recycling processes. About GEP ECOTECH GEP ECOTECH is a leader in advanced waste processing and recycling solutions. Our shredding systems—ranging from dual-stage shredders to shear shredders—are designed to handle a wide variety of materials with precision and efficiency. In the realm of FRP recycling, our solutions are designed to transform these challenging materials into manageable sizes, making them suitable for diverse applications such as alternative fuels and construction fillers. Through continuous innovation and customized solutions, we empower clients to meet sustainability objectives, minimize environmental impact, and enhance resource recovery efforts.
